title: Bike Watching
description: An interactive map visualization displaying Boston's bike traffic patterns over time using Mapbox and D3.js. Includes dynamic filtering, time-based analysis, and a legend for traffic flow trends.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio showcasing my projects and skills in web development and data science. Made a public facing website to showcase. Managed code via Github version control.

title: K-Nearest Neighbours Classifier
description: Made a classifier that can classify hand-written numerical images into a digit with 98% accuracy. Enhanced model performance through parameter tuning and feature scaling, improving processing speed.

title: Sentimental Analysis
description: Developed and deployed a robust sentiment analysis pipeline using Python and NLP libaries, optimizing real-time data processing and sentiment tracking with 96% accuracy. Developed automated reporting tools.

title: Data Analysis and Model Building
description: Conducted in-depth analysis of complex datasets, including missingness assessment, prediction model development, and fairness evaluation. Created a public-facing showcase to present said findings.

title: Government Dashboard Development
description: Developed a government dashboard using Java, incorporating features such as real time feedbacl systems and progress bares to enhance interactivity and user engagement.

title: Deceptive Visualization Analysis
description: A project that explores the effects of design choices in data cisualization on the perception of the story it tells to the user.

title: Predictive Modeling
description: A detailed research project focusing on predictive modeling using real world datasets from Kaggle. The project included exploratory data analysis, model selection and performance evaluation.

title: Plagiarism Checker
description: A python based plagiarism detection tool that analyzes text similarity using NLP techniques. The project implemented TF-IDF vectorization and cosine similarity to compare documents, highlighting potential copied content.

title: Inventory Management System
description: A java based web application designed for a local grocery store to efficiently manage inventory. Allows store managers to track stock levels, update product details, and generate sale reports.

title: Dynamic Fiber Optic Display
description: Designed and deployed a dynamic fiber optic display that can deplicate an image in 3d ways. Hardware makes use of fiber optic cables, servos, mototrs, pulley systems etc.

title: Robotic Flower
description: Used Raspberry Pi to make software for a robotic arm that uses computer vision to bloom the robotic flower when user is smiling and wilt otherwise with 92% accuracy. Uses open CV.

title: Visualization of Healthcare Data
description: Built data visualization that tells a story about healthcare experiment - Body temperature of students in examinations to answer the question 'Does stress lower performance efficiency in Tests?'
